about_the_game:
'80s synth beats and electronica mixed with classical strings and orchestral elements. This is the SmuggleCraft Original Soundtrack. From high energy races to smooth easy cruising, every track will get you pumped for your next smuggling gig.

The SmuggleCraft Soundtrack features music from composer Bravendary.

The soundtrack is available in .aiff format. Track listing as follows:
The Aspiration
The Care Package
The Chase
The Chill
The Combustion
The Deep
The Fortress
The Gates
The Glimmer
The Jewel
The Night Run
The Rumble
The Rush Delivery

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+.
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any 16 bit soundcard (speakers/headphones required for soundtrack)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5 or newer
  • Processor: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any 16 bit soundcard (speakers/headphones required for soundtrack)
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any 16 bit soundcard (speakers/headphones required for soundtrack)

name: SmuggleCraft Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD Phenom X3 865
  • Memory: 768 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any 16 bit soundcard (speakers/headphones required for soundtrack)

From high energy races to smooth easy cruising, every track will get you pumped for your next smuggling gig.The SmuggleCraft Soundtrack features music from composer Bravendary.
